A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I suspect that many people leaving reviews haven't actually seen the movie\, but are just blindly voting in opposition to the film's multiculturalism. For my part\, I thought the film played homage to the original Star Wars while continuing the storyline perfectly. Of course there were some comedic episodes that were a bit distracting\, but overall the film should be appealing to both old Star Wars fans and newcomers.
